modShortDescription: Turns off all of the "Powered" lights in POI's. It may take ~30 seconds for the lights to go out sometimes.
modDescription:
Turns off all of the “Powered” lights in [POI’s](https://7daystodiemods.com/tag/7-days-to-die-prefab/).

## Note

It may take \~30 seconds for the [lights](https://7daystodiemods.com/tag/7-days-to-die-lights/) to go out sometimes. Also, light many mods that add new blocks to the game, once added it has to remain in your mod list. Dayhawk highly suggest using this for new worlds.

## Changelog

* **Fixed an upgrade issue**  
   * The were upgrading to the wrong block. That is fixed now. Slowed down the growth time to allow for the chunk to load.

**[Download](https://yehonal.github.io/DownGit/#/home?url=https://github.com/DayhawkSilverstar/7DaysToDieMods/tree/master/Dayhawks%20No%20POI%20Lights)**

The forum topic of the mod is [here](https://community.7daystodie.com/topic/21381-a19-dayhawks-modlets/).

**Credits:** [Dayhawk](https://7daystodiemods.com/tag/dayhawk/)
